title: Ketu Transit in the 9th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the ninth house reshapes belief systems, faith, and long-held philosophies for Leo ascendants. Traditional doctrines lose emotional grip, pushing a personal search for truth beyond rituals. Distance from mentors or father figures may be felt, yet inner guidance strengthens. Long journeys feel less attractive; inner exploration dominates. When humility replaces certainty, Ketu refines wisdom into lived understanding rather than inherited belief.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Distance from mentors or father figures

closing: This transit dissolves borrowed beliefs. By living truth directly, Ketu converts faith into quiet wisdom.
